item.title: Cozy Earth’s Oprah Winfrey-Approved Pajamas Are Over Half Off for Labor Day
item.description: The bedding and loungewear brand has become an “Oprah’s Favorite Things” staple. Snag her top picks for a fraction of retail with THR’s exclusive promo code.

item.title: Josh Peck Claims ‘Drake & Josh’ Producers Didn’t Get “Permission” to Use Oprah Winfrey’s Likeness on Show
item.description: The actor recalls using a “non-sanctioned Oprah double” to film the car crash scene in the season four episode.
